segments.text: I see the woman, completely lost in her task at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she hasn't even noticed the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious watching her stand in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are up to mischief, and I wonder what they'll do next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is dangerously perched on that stool, and I can sense something bad is coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out a warning, but I hold back, entranced by the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
